did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Archives, Preston Library, Virginia Military Institute
did.physdesc: The collection is filed in one manuscript box.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert K. Turner Collection, mss 00003, Virginia Military Institute Archives, Lexington, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of annotated typescripts, galley and page proofs, and other pre-publication materials relating to the book Letters of a New Market Cadet(University of North Carolina Press, 1961) edited by historians Robert K. Turner and John G. Barrett. Most of the original documents that appear in the book are located in the Jaqueline Beverly Stanard Papers VMI Archives (mss 00083).
